CustomField.formula: OR(Historical_Sales_or_Historical_COGS__c ==1 , Camp_Profit_Change_100k__c == 1, GTM_Diff_60__c == 1, Zero_Future_Costs__c == 1, Camp_Cost_Change_50__c == 1, UOM_Does_Not_Match__c == TRUE, Zero_Hist_Rev_or_Hist_COGs__c == 1, Price_Increase_50__c == 1)
CustomField.label: Outlier Flag
